# Options

## trace
Type: `Boolean`

Show a full traceback on error.

## compile
Type: `Boolean`

Compile only but do not run.

## rails
Type: `Boolean`

Generate rails compatible code (Implies --compile).

## translator
Type: `Boolean`

Enable translator plugin.

## logicLess
Type: `Boolean`

Enable logic less plugin.

## pretty
Type: `Boolean`

Produce pretty html.

## option
Type: `String|Array`

Set slim option.
